name: sort-array
author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
description: Isomorphic, load-anywhere function to sort an array by scalar, deep or computed values in any standard or custom order

scripts.test: npm run dist && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:ci: 75lb-nature test-runner test/defaults.js test/sort-computed-property.js test/sort-custom-order.js test/sort-falsy.js test/sort-primitives.js test/sort-small.js test/sort.js test/validation.js
